contents.text: Thank you for calling DIY, the safe online community where kids discover new passions, level up their skills, and connect with fearless geeks.
To learn about our courses and workshops, press 1.
To explore our coding and robotics classes, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our coding and robotics team. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Enroll my child in an evening coding and robotics class starting next month.
I’d like details on your beginner coding and robotics courses so I can retrain for a civilian tech career.
Review course outlines and sign up for the Python robotics and coding modules
I’d like help signing my granddaughter up for the coding and robotics classes.
I’d like to sign up for the Python robotics module in your coding and robotics program.

contents.text: To hear about our art and design workshops, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our art and design workshop coordinators. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and schedule details for weekend art and design workshops.
I’m interested in your art and design workshops focused on creative therapy for veterans.
Get schedules and registration details for the digital art and design workshops
I want to enroll my grandson in the art and design workshop.
I want details on the 3D modeling workshop in your art and design series.

contents.text: To manage your account or membership details, press 2.
To update your membership information, press 1.
Please hold while we retrieve your membership details. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Update the credit card on file for my DIY membership.
I need to update my account’s contact info and payment details.
Update my membership plan and revise my billing information in my account
I need to update my membership details, like my address or payment info.
I need to update my membership to the student annual plan.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to technical support. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Resolve the login issue preventing me from accessing my DIY account.
I’m unable to log in to my account and need help resetting my password.
Troubleshoot my login error and regain access to the DIY online portal
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support to access my account.
I’m getting a login error and need help accessing my account.
